content.text: Don't know what to do? Click the instructions to see them again

iceage_move_events.toolbox: <xml id="toolbox" style="display: none;"><block type="studio_move"><title name="DIR">8</title></block><block type="studio_move"><title name="DIR">2</title></block><block type="studio_move"><title name="DIR">1</title></block><block type="studio_move"><title name="DIR">4</title></block></xml>

iceage_sound_and_points.startBlocks: <block type="studio_whenSpriteCollided" deletable="false" x="20" y="20"></block><block type="studio_repeatForever" deletable="false" x="20" y="150"><statement name="DO"><block type="studio_moveDistance"><title name="SPRITE">1</title><title name="DIR">2</title><title name="DISTANCE">400</title><next><block type="studio_moveDistance"><title name="SPRITE">1</title><title name="DIR">8</title><title name="DISTANCE">400</title></block></next></block></statement></block><block type="studio_whenLeft" deletable="false" x="20" y="300"><next><block type="studio_move"><title name="SPRITE">0</title><title name="DIR">8</title></block></next></block><block type="studio_whenRight" deletable="false" x="20" y="400"><next><block type="studio_move"><title name="SPRITE">0</title><title name="DIR">2</title></block></next></block><block type="studio_whenUp" deletable="false" x="20" y="500"><next><block type="studio_move"><title name="SPRITE">0</title><title name="DIR">1</title></block></next></block><block type="studio_whenDown" deletable="false" x="20" y="600"><next><block type="studio_move"><title name="SPRITE">0</title><title name="DIR">4</title></block></next></block>

iceage_warn_ice_age.toolbox: <xml id="toolbox" style="display: none;"><block type="studio_setSpriteSpeed"><title name="VALUE">Studio.SpriteSpeed.FAST</title></block><block type="studio_setBackground"><title name="VALUE">"icy5"</title></block><block type="studio_moveDistance"><title name="DISTANCE">400</title><title name="SPRITE">1</title></block><block type="studio_saySprite"></block><block type="studio_playSound"><title name="SOUND">winpoint2</title></block><block type="studio_changeScore"></block></xml>
iceage_warn_ice_age.startBlocks: <block type="when_run" deletable="false" x="20" y="20"></block><block type="studio_repeatForever" deletable="false" x="20" y="150"><statement name="DO"><block type="studio_moveDistance"><title name="SPRITE">1</title><title name="DIR">1</title><title name="DISTANCE">400</title><next><block type="studio_moveDistance"><title name="SPRITE">1</title><title name="DIR">4</title><title name="DISTANCE">400</title></block></next></block></statement></block><block type="studio_whenSpriteCollided" deletable="false" x="20" y="290"><title name="SPRITE2">0</title><title name="SPRITE2">1</title><next><block type="studio_playSound"><title name="SOUND">winpoint2</title><next><block type="studio_saySprite"><title name="TEXT">Ice Age!</title></block></next></block></next></block><block type="studio_whenLeft" deletable="false" x="20" y="410"><next><block type="studio_move"><title name="DIR">8</title></block></next></block><block type="studio_whenRight" deletable="false" x="20" y="510"><next><block type="studio_move"><title name="DIR">2</title></block></next></block><block type="studio_whenUp" deletable="false" x="20" y="610"><next><block type="studio_move"><title name="DIR">1</title></block></next></block><block type="studio_whenDown" deletable="false" x="20" y="710"><next><block type="studio_move"><title name="DIR">4</title></block></next></block>

iceage_throw_hearts.toolbox: <xml id="toolbox" style="display: none;"><block type="studio_whenSpriteCollided"><title name="SPRITE1">1</title><title name="SPRITE2">anything</title></block><block type="studio_setSpriteEmotion"><title name="SPRITE">1</title></block><block type="studio_throw"><title name="SPRITE">0</title><title name="DIR">2</title></block><block type="studio_playSound"></block><block type="studio_saySprite"></block></xml>
